name: PunchBots: a unusual fight game
description:
A fighting game with a different twist, learn when to jump and when to attack, dominate your opponents with your strategy and agility in this robot fighting game.

 This version of the game is an improved and advanced version of its mobile version (pocket edition).

 What is different?...  This version of the game is a party game for up to 4 players, with support for AI opponents.

The gameplay also underwent changes with the ability to fully control movement along with support for controls.

 This version will slowly get updates and more support for PC game features.

I hope you can play, share and share your ideas to improve this game!
